name: apical
content:
apical adjective
(HIGHEST POINT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
mathematics
  specialized at the highest point or top of a shape or object: At the tip of the stalk is a single, large, apical bud. an apical angle of 120°
More examplesFewer examplesWith plants such as astrantia, seed sets first in the apical flower. Clearly, the presence of the apical bud is stopping the lateral buds from growing.New apical leaves continue to emerge.

apical adjective
(BODY ORGAN)
medical
  specialized related to the pointed end of an organ: The diagnosis was apical carcinoma - a non-small-cell cancer in the left lung apex. See
apex
More examplesFewer examplesTests revealed apical pleural thickening outside the lung.The cardiac apical impulse may be overactive.Do not give the drug if the apical rate is less than 60 beats per minute.
